Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' released in 2003, which two songs are connected through the edge that states they are from the same movie?
Options:
A. Boss Kaun Tha
B. Jo Gaya Woh Gaya
C. Tumse Milke
D. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko

Question: In the 2003 movie 'Jhankaar Beats', which two songs are sung by different singers Amit Kumar and Udit Narayan?
Options:
A. A) boss kaun tha and sahi hai re (bonus track)
B. B) jaane dil mein and chura liya
C. C) koi na koi chahiye and tu hai toh
D. D) hum rahe na rahe and tumse hi
Answer: A) boss kaun tha and sahi hai re (bonus track)

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which two songs composed by Vishal-Shekhar share a connection?
Options:
A. Jo gaya woh gaya and Sahi hai re (bonus track)
B. Tumse milke and Jaane dil mein
C. Chura liya hai and Tera hone laga hoon
D. Dil hai chota sa and Aankhon ki gustakhiyan
Answer: Jo gaya woh gaya and Sahi hai re (bonus track)

Question: In the 2003 movie 'Jhankaar Beats', which two songs are sung by different singers KK and Shaan?
Options:
A. jo gaya woh gaya and suno na
B. suno na and dil de diya
C. jo gaya woh gaya and dil de diya
D. suno na and khudaya khair
Answer: jo gaya woh gaya and suno na

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which popular songs sung by KK share a connection through their themes of love and longing?
Options:
A. A. jo gaya woh gaya
B. B. tu aashiqui hai
C. C. Both A and B
D. D. None of the above

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which two songs are sung by KK and Amit Kumar respectively?
Options:
A. A. Suno Na and Humein Tumse Pyaar Kitna
B. B. Tumse Milke and Jaane Dil Mein
C. C. Chura Liya and Tera Hone Laga Hoon
D. D. Dil Diyan Gallan and Hasi Ban Gaye
Answer: A. Suno Na and Humein Tumse Pyaar Kitna

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which songs are sung by Shaan and are from 'Jo Boley Giabbaan'?
Options:
A. Suno Na
B. Tera Muskurana
C. Both A and B
D. None of the above

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which two songs are sung by KK and Mahalakshmi Iyer respectively?
Options:
A. Suno Na and Jab Kabhi Chand Na Ho
B. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko and Jaane Dil Mein
C. Tera Hone Laga Hoon and Tum Hi Ho
D. Pehla Nasha and Koi Mil Gaya
Answer: Suno Na and Jab Kabhi Chand Na Ho

Question: In the movie 'Jhankaar Beats' (2003), which of the following songs is also sung by KK and is a popular track from the movie 'Jo Boley Giabbaan'?
Options:

C. Tera Hone Laga Hoon
D. Kal Ho Naa Ho

Options:

C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
